data.description:
# Gear Out is a unique, tense and completely immersive interactive escape-room puzzle game.
Explore the creepy environments and solve challenging puzzles to escape to the next level. But watch out - you're not always in there alone!

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982647_793570546078791_5654836044375293105_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=jotaT4pIOe0Q7kNvgHQTNL1&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYArixALK9PTFp3nsh8F6nEogxeBnpAIjgl1wN-3YcCjQA&oe=670D124C)

Navigate through 26 different environments, solving problems and interacting with obstacles to locate gears. Arrange the gears on the final puzzles to open the door and escape to the next level.  

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031583_1137153680768360_6743924441909513949_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7y3Gan1-EWMQ7kNvgEOywa_&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDsICvu71qRGBlXPey8tQneEMi447mdpJGJCN4uruYcVw&oe=670D0BE3)

Each level can be randomised to generate up to **9,999** puzzle variations for extended game play. Explore caves, tunnels, underwater, basements, drains, industrial areas and offices. Interact with doors, wheels, cranes, levers, buttons, hatches, drawers, lockers, wall-bashing hammers and more. The scale of each level varies from single rooms to expansive complexes and mazes.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974691_1795887047588091_2094686340757278142_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bQOiWB58Qq4Q7kNvgHKos1X&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAmK4MXxyNVrBC30NqeioRzevV84gI_xyJVydev9dB7IQ&oe=670CE0E0)

Controls are fully customizable to your specific preference. Play seated, standing or room-scale with one or both controllers.

# To succeed at Gear Out, you need to be smart and brave. Ready to put yourself to the test?  Install Gear Out now.

changelog.change_log:
New textures throughout cave levels for added realism,
Improved teleporting locator
Adjusted walking speed (click joystick down for run speed)

Added controller preferences on first start up.
Made distance placement of gears a little easier
Fixed a couple of minor potential issues.
Improved gear placement system to make it easier to place multiple gears (such as one in each hand) at the same time.

V1.16
Added restart level function to in-game control panel.
Added player run function - click the movement thumbstick down to toggle
Found and fixed issue with catching distance grabbed gears
Added better handling of distance grab cancelled mid flight.
Shortened the pause time waiting for distance grab
Also allowed the player to press trigger after pressing grab to immediately distance grab
Reduced the frequency of the skeleton in Level 8 appearing.
Reduced bat sound effects
Improved Hammer dynamics
Added Sound Effects where hammer hits the drawers
